title: Shotcut 24.02 Open-Source Video Editor Released with Ambisonic Audio Support
description:
Shotcut 24.02 open-source and free video editor is now available for download with ambisonic spatial (spherical) audio support, as well as various improvements.

The post Shotcut 24.02 Open-Source Video Editor Released with Ambisonic Audio Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: GNOME 46 to Ship with Experimental Variable Refresh Rate (VRR) Support
description:
The upcoming GNOME 46 desktop environment series will finally ship the long-awaited variable refresh rate (VRR) feature.

The post GNOME 46 to Ship with Experimental Variable Refresh Rate (VRR) Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
